menu.wait: > You have to wait for the game to start
menu.game: > You are not currently in any game, join a lobby to start

player.notFound: > Player not found in any game

input.login: > Wrong input!! The nickname must be specified
input.syntax: > Wrong input!! The correct syntax is {syntax}
input.color: > Wrong input!! {color} is not a valid color

error.phase: > Command not supported for this phase
error.state: > Command not supported for this game state
error.stateCard: > Wrong Card state: must be {correctstate} instead is {wrongstate}
error.statePlayer: > Wrong Player state: must be {correctstate} instead is {wrongstate}
error.viewing: > You are already looking at a tile
error.remove: > You were trying to do an illegal remove
error.add: > You were trying to do an illegal add
error.tile: > You passed a tile with wrong type, correct type is {tType}
error.command: > Command not supported for this card
error.deckAllowed: > Player not allowed to see mini decks

info.finished:
> Wait until everyone is finished then use /check and check your ship,
  use /status to see how other players are doing

spaceship.right: > Your ship is correct, wait until everyone is checked right
spaceship.wrong: > Your ship is wrong remove some tiles to make it right

info.ready: > We are waiting for all players to be ready to start the game, use /status to see how other players are doing
info.outOfGame: > You are out of the game!

disconnect.lobby_owner: > The owner has disconnected from the lobby, so you got kicked out
disconnect.lobby: > A player has disconnected from the lobby, now the lobby has {att}/{max} players
disconnect.game: > A player has disconnected from the game, so the game is over

help:
Available Commands:
/help - Show possible commands list
/exit - Exit game
/login <nickname> - Register with your nickname
/create <maxPlayers> <color> <level> - Create a new lobby
/lobbies - Show available lobbies
/join <lobbyId> <color> - Join existing lobby

Game commands:
/flipHourglass - Flip hourglass
/hourglass - See timeleft in hourglass
/view - Show your spaceship
/view <nickname> - View the spaceship of another player of the game
/take - Take a random non visible tile
/takeTile <id> - Take a specific tile
/heap - See heap tiles 
/takeMiniDeck <index> - View a minideck
/returnMiniDeck - Return the minideck
/book - Book a tile
/addBooked <index> <riga> <colonna> - Add to your ship a tile that you booked
/return - Return a tile
/add <riga> <colonna> - Add tile to spaceship
/rotate - Rotate the current tile
/rotateBookedTile [<indice>] - ruota la tile prenotata di indice <indice>. Se l'indice non Ã¨ presente, ruota l'unica tile presente in tale slot
/remove <riga> <colonna> - Remove a tile
/finish - Signal that you've finished your spaceship
/check - Check if spaceship is correct
/ready - Player is ready to start playing
/addCrew <riga> <colonna> <type> - Add crew members
/removeCrew <riga> <colonna> - Remove crew members
/next - Play next card
/early - Anticipated landing
/choice <true/false> - Make a choice
/choiceBox <true/false> - Make a choice regarding a box
/moveBox <startX> <startY> <endX> <endY> <boxType> <on/off> - Move a box
/choicePlanet <index> - Chose a planet
/roll - Roll the dice
/damage <riga> <colonna> - See damage in position

For other specific commands, check game documentation.

lobby.creation: > The lobby with id {num} has been created!
lobby.join: > You have been added to the lobby {num}

build.addCrew: Crew member added to your tile

ingame.hidefinishcannon: Double cannon choice finished, {number} cannons activated
ingame.hidefinishmotor: Double motor choice finished, {number} motors activated

minideck.view: Now you can see the MiniDeck #{index}
minideck.viewing: minideck #{index} is being viewed by another player

build.0:
Welcome trucker now begins the construction phase of your ship! 
Let's start with some simple rules, by doing /take you take a tile from the pile and place it in the current tile slot 
at this point you can decide whether to rotate it, add it to your ship or return it to the pile and take a new one. 
Build your ship according to your needs and use /legend to see the meanings of the pieces. Have fun!
build.1:
Welcome trucker now begins the construction phase of your ship! 
Let's start with some simple rules, by doing /take you take a tile from the pile and place it in the current tile slot 
at this point you can decide whether to rotate it, add it to your ship, reserve it for later (you can only reserve 2 tiles at a time) 
or return it to the pile and take a new one. Build your ship according to your needs and use /legend to see the meanings of the pieces. 
Remember that you can also turn the timer to put pressure on your opponents and force them to move. Have fun!

helper.check:
Now you are in the check phase, typing /check will check 
if your ship is ready to leave for the galactic adventure. 
If there are errors you will have to fix it before you can leave
helper.correction:
Your ship has some errors that need to be corrected before you launch, here are the checks you need to do:
1) Single connectors must not be connected to double connectors
2) Smooth sides must not be adjacent to connectors
3) Each engine must point towards the back of the ship and must not have components in the box immediately behind the exhaust
4) Each cannon must not have components placed immediately in front of its firing mouth
5) The ship must be fully connected (no separate sections)

initialization.0:
Your ship is ready to sail into deep space now you just need to add your crew using /addCrew
or /ready for an automatic filling
initialization.1:
Your ship is ready to sail into deep space now you just need to add your crew using /addCrew
or /ready for an automatic filling
Remember that:
1) You must have 2 humans on your starting cabin
2) Your ship cannot accommodate more than 1 alien of each type

helper.match:
The adventure has begun, keep an eye on the game status to know 
if it's your turn, which card is in play and what your opponents are doing.
Good luck!

command.pregame:
Available Commands:
/login <nickname> - Register with your nickname
/create <maxPlayers> <color> <level> - Create a new lobby
/lobbies - Show available lobbies
/join <lobbyId> <color> - Join existing lobby
/exit - Exit game
command.build:
Game commands:
/flipHourglass - Flip hourglass
/hourglass - See timeleft in hourglass
/view - Show your spaceship
/view <nickname> - View the spaceship of another player of the game
/take - Take a random not visible tile
/takeTile <id> - Take a specific tile
/heap - See heap tiles 
/takeMiniDeck <index> - View a minideck
/returnMiniDeck - Return the minideck
/book - Book a tile
/addBooked <index> <riga> <colonna> - Add to your ship a tile that you booked
/return - Return a tile
/add <riga> <colonna> - Add tile to spaceship
/rotate - Rotate the current tile
/rotateBookedTile [<indice>] - rotates the reserved tile of index <index>. If the index is not present, rotates the only tile present in that slot
/finish - Signal that you've finished your spaceship
